resources.string:
The Corona Virus is a dangerous pandemic.

This app contains a MAP and simulation of disease SPREAD for South Africa

I take no responsibility for any action taken in response to this app
 Please use official channels to get proper information

Statistics on the MAP are from the University of Pretoria.
 Currently stats are updated daily.
 CURVE shows the increase in detected cases. 
 SPREAD simulation is meant to show how hard it is to avoid getting infected
 So stay home guys

Above all\:
 don't forget to wash your hands guys and stay safe
